Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a manipulated image that has been circulating online for several years.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image is genuine without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image has been manipulated and does not depict Steve Irwin and Tupac together.
Exaggerate: The claim may be seen as exaggerating the significance of the image by stating that it would make people smile, even though it is not genuine.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim does not appear to falter at times as it consistently presents the information about the manipulated image and its origins.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide alternative explanations for the manipulated image.
